name: cmdo-toolkit
description: A collection of tools and services used to build software applications.

scripts.build:access: cd ./packages/access && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn clear
scripts.build:events: cd ./packages/events && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn clear
scripts.build:http: cd ./packages/http && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn clear
scripts.build:inverse: cd ./packages/inverse && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn clear
scripts.build:router: cd ./packages/router && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn clear
scripts.build:socket: cd ./packages/socket && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn clear
scripts.clear: yarn clear:access && yarn clear:events && yarn clear:http && yarn clear:inverse && yarn clear:router && yarn clear:socket
scripts.clean: yarn clean:access && yarn clean:events && yarn clean:http && yarn clean:inverse && yarn clean:router && yarn clean:socket
